name: Board of trustees; number; composition
text: The board of trustees shall be composed of nine members elected at-large by qualified voters in the State.  Of the nine members to be elected one shall reside on the island of Hawaii; one shall reside on the island of Maui; and one shall reside on the island of Molokai; one shall reside on the island of Kauai; and one shall reside on the island of Oahu. [L 1979, c 196, pt of §8; am L 2001, c 55, §3]
